name: Eldritch Knight
description: Eldritch Knights combine the martial mastery common to all Fighters with a careful study of magic.

3.Spellcasting: Cast spells using Intelligence. Know 2 cantrips and 3 first-level spells from the Wizard spell list. Most spells must be from Abjuration or Evocation schools. Spell slots: 2 first-level at 3rd level, increasing as you level up.
3.Weapon Bond: At the end of a Short or Long Rest, touch one weapon. You can't be disarmed of that weapon unless Incapacitated. If the weapon is on the same plane, you can summon it as a Bonus Action. Can bond up to two weapons.

7.War Magic: When you use your action to cast a cantrip, you can make one weapon attack as a Bonus Action.

10.Eldritch Strike: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, that creature has Disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

15.Arcane Charge: When you use Action Surge, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can teleport before or after the additional action.

18.Improved War Magic: When you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one weapon attack as a Bonus Action.
